Key Match Events: India edged Sri Lanka by two runs on a difficult wicket in the first game, taking a 1-0 lead in the series.
Pre-Game Insights: India are without their senior players, opening up opportunities for younger players.
Sri Lanka have a pretty similar squad to their World Cup campaign.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series kicked off with India holding their nerve in a thriller at the Wankhede on Tuesday.
The men in blue are without Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, Jasprit Bumrah, KL Rahul and Shreyas Iyer.
Others: India and Sri Lanka have competed against each other in 27 T20 internationals, with India dominating the scoreline.
